text: Zai na ri——fuhuo ri, ta jiang jihe nimen, zhe jiushi chenggong [xinshi jin leyuan] yu shibai [bu xinyang zhe jin huo yu] zhi ri.[Zai chenshi shi] shei xinyang an la bing xingshan,[zai na ri] ta [an la] jiang shemian shei de zuiguo, bing shi ta jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi weida de chenggong.
